name: KABOOM CACTUS
description:
Fly between pots and pop balloons with cactus Elu! 🌵 Use your brainy skills 🤯 and estimate angles! Bounce around with cactus, collect coins and chests and open magic gates! Challenge yourself in over 400 unique and handmade levels!

● Challenge your brainy skills and pop balloons! 🌵+🎈=💥
● Play over 400 unique and HANDMADE levels!
● Estimate angles and BOUNCE around on the way up to paradise!
● Fly the magic rainbow and collect coins! 🌈
● Manage your turns and develop tactics!
● Laugh at characters’ funny faces and expressions!
● Intuitive gameplay: no boring introductions or other texts - just play right away!
● A game for everyone! KABOOM CACTUS is also a kids and family friendly game 🎮
● Compete with players around the world in a global leaderboard! 🏆
● Get special rewards for your achievements! 🏅
● Listen to magic music: all songs composed exclusively for a paradise 😇
● Choose between levels in a fluffy world map up in the clouds!
● Not endless! If you’re good enough you’ll reach the paradise 🤩
